lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The government has pointed to this stronger real rise in imports than exports when rejecting international pressure to boost domestic consumption.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Ifo economic research institute in Munich said in a study published today that the trade surplus would probably only fall to around 101 billion marks this year, compared with the 113 billion mark 1986 record.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Statistics Office said after cheaper import prices were taken into consideration, West Germany's imports by volume rose by more than three pct in the first five months.

lst.name: sentence
